title: Cenovis Detox B and Energy 60 Tablets
description: Cenovis Detox B and Energy 60 Tablets Description:Cenovis® Detox B + Energy is a high strength formula including Milk Thistlestandardized extract derived from 1...
cleaned_text: 60 Tablets Description:Cenovis® Detox B + Energy is a high strength formula including Milk Thistle standardized extract derived from 10500mg of dry fruit. This product relieves fatigue and assists digestion of dietary fats. As the largest internal organ in the body, the liver carries out a large number of functions including detoxification. Milk thistle has been traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to support healthy liver function, relieve symptoms of indigestion and relieve digestive discomfort. Vitamin B12 supports nervous system function, relieves tiredness in healthy adults and Supports energy levels and cognitive function Vitamin B3 supports skin and body mucous membrane healthy, and assists metabolism of carbohydrates, proteins and dietary fats. Vitamin B6 supports haemoglobin synthesis, assists healthy red blood cell production and helps to maintain healthy immune system function & nervous system function. Ingredients:Silybum marianum dry fruit extract 150mg, from (10.5g) 10500mg (min) Usage Directions:Adults: Take 2 tablets daily with a meal or as recommended by your healthcare professional. Suitable for up to 3 months supplementation. Warnings:Always read the label and follow the directions for use. You'll automatically receive free standard shipping, too.** How good! * A shipping handling fee may apply at the checkout for orders weighing 10kg or more ** Any cold-chain items will carry a $9.95 Express Cold-Chain Shipping fee See [shipping & returns policy](https://www.healthylife.com.au/shipping-returns)for more details. - [Returns & exchanges] How Do Returns & Refunds Work? All products you buy from the Healthylife website are covered by the Healthylife [Returns Policy](https://www.healthylife.com.au/shipping-returns). Please read our full [Returns Policy](https://www.healthylife.com.au/shipping-returns)to find out how to return a product that is faulty or if you have changed your mind. How We Handle Them: Change of Mind - If you've had a change of mind about an item you have ordered, we'll need to receive it back to us unopened and unused, in the original packaging. Faulty Item - If the item you have received is faulty, please contact us with a detailed description of the product fault, alongside a photo if possible. Allergic Reaction - In the rare instance you've had an allergic reaction to a product, please discontinue use of the product immediately. We may reach out for further information on the reaction. Allergy returns must be less than 20% used upon arrival back to us. Incorrect / Damaged Items - If you have received an item that isn't what you ordered, or it arrived damaged, please take a photo and contact us within 7 days of delivery. Please don't dispose of the item without informing us. What Items Are Restricted For Returns*? We will not accept Change of Mind Returns for the following items: - Rapid antigen tests - Baby formula - Prescription Medicine - Compounded 'Pharmacy Only' Items - Perfumes & Colognes - Refrigerated Items - Bulk / Special Orders - Personalised items, digital downloads, prepaid cards or vouchers; - Clearance items; - Items that are advertised as not eligible for change of mind returns. -
